activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11679
activity.text:
Hy @Jeffrin2005  I like to work on this pz assigned to me

Here is my solution 

I will enhance the landing page by:

Removing the excessive grey background.

Adding a modern gradient or clean background color.

Adding smooth hover transitions to buttons and links.

Expected Timeline:

UI Fix: 1-2 days

Review & Feedback: 1 day

Please confirm if there's any specific design guideline to follow.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11681
activity.text:
Hy @bodhish I would like to work  in this 

HERE IS MY APPROCH 

I will integrate the treating doctor feature in the encounter system.
My approach:

Fetch treating doctor list from the backend API.

Show a dropdown for selecting a doctor.

If the current user is a doctor, show an "Assign to Me" button.

Update treating and discharge summary to display treating doctor details.

Expected Timeline:

Feature Implementation: 4-5 days ;

Testing & Fixes: 2 days

Please confirm if the treating doctor list is available in the API response.
